name: GameDevHQ: Space Ship Scene
description:
Fun mini project practicing Timeline and Cinemachine. Fly through the red circular ring to the Dreadnaught to warp to Jupiter. 

Press 'R' to switch from Cockpit to 3rd Person. A cutscene will play after 20 seconds of no Mouse or Keypress inputs. 'Hold Shift' to move forward and press 'Q' to quit. WASD to turn/rotate.
